property.name: insertQuery
property.value: INSERT INTO catgenome.homolog_group ( group_id, primary_gene_id, primary_gene_tax_id, type, database_id ) VALUES ( :GROUP_ID, :PRIMARY_GENE_ID, :PRIMARY_GENE_TAX_ID, :TYPE, :DATABASE_ID )

property.name: loadQuery
property.value: SELECT gr.group_id as group_id, gr.primary_gene_id as primary_gene_id, gr.primary_gene_tax_id as primary_gene_tax_id, gr.type as type, desc.symbol as gene_name, desc.title as protein_name, hdb.name as homolog_database FROM catgenome.homolog_group gr join catgenome.homolog_database hdb on gr.database_id = hdb.database_id left join catgenome.homolog_gene_desc desc on gr.primary_gene_id = desc.gene_id

property.name: getTotalCountQuery
property.value: select count(*) as count from catgenome.homolog_group
